fullText: While 'Shucked' may not be the most sophisticated musical to hit Broadway, it's an undeniably fun romp that celebrates the power of community and the importance of staying true to oneself.
dtliExcerpt: While 'Shucked' may not be the most sophisticated musical to hit Broadway, it's an undeniably fun romp that celebrates the power of community and the importance of staying true to oneself.
showScoreExcerpt: While 'Shucked' may not be the most sophisticated musical to hit Broadway, it's an undeniably fun romp that celebrates the power of community and the importance of staying true to oneself.
nycTheatreExcerpt: "The funniest and most invigorating new show on Broadway...Winner of the 2022 Pulitzer Prize, "Fat Ham" recasts its source material to imagine what Shakespeare did not  how people might overcome circumstances, expectations and their own demons to forge new paths through life."
